attributes.action: Increase the speed limit for trucks on main roads to 50 MPH not 40 MPH
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current law states that all HGV's must travel at 10mph below the spead limit of cars on main roads, in todays current climate it leads to cars overtaking on dangerous stretches of road just to get by and restricts the drivers of HGV's who are usually working to tight deadlines.  With todays vehicle standards and ABS there is no longer a need for this outdated rule.
